title: Tony Travers on the 2015 General Election result
itunes:author: Professor Tony Travers, Martin Rogers
description: Contributor(s): Professor Tony Travers, Martin Rogers | On the morning after the 2015 General Election, as the UK attempts to make sense of a result which took many commentators by surprise, Professor Tony Travers gives his initial reaction. Why did the exit poll differ so much from the polling in the run up to the election and what does the result mean for both the winners and the losers?
